title: BHAOO
description:
following applications/packages that are being used for critical jobs. Sippy team need to list down these applications and avoid to stop or uninstall these applications in any situation.

1. /usr/local/etc/rc.d/zcaprc
2. /usr/local/bin/zcap
3. libosip2-4.0.0
4. libpcap
5. sqlite3

Python packages:
1.psycopg2
2.libftp

Application directories:

1. /var/data
2. /root/zproc
3. /var/log/pcap

crontab entry:

*/5              *      *       *       *       /usr/bin/lockf -t 0 -ks /var/run/zpr.lock /root/zproc/zpr sm7

Please ensure that these application/libraries are not removed from any of the Bhaoo Sippy server.
description_text:
following
 applications/packages that are being used for critical jobs. Sippy team
 need to list down these applications and avoid to stop or uninstall 
these applications in any situation. 
   
 1. /usr/local/etc/rc.d/zcaprc

 5. sqlite3

Application directories:
